thread.title: Catalan ex-leader to face German court

title: Catalan ex-leader to face German court
text:
Catalan ex-leader to face German court 5:22pm IST - 00:54 
Former Catalan president Carles Puigdemont is due to appear in a German court on Monday as Spain seeks t to extradite him over the region's independence fight after a night of protests there in which dozens of people were hurt in clashes with police. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Former Catalan president Carles Puigdemont is due to appear in a German court on Monday as Spain seeks t to extradite him over the region's independence fight after a night of protests there in which dozens of people were hurt in clashes with police.
